snippet: A passenger’s attempt to light up on a bus to London played into fears of a terrorist attack tied to the Olympic Games.
abstract: Security scare causing road closure lasts seven hours as a man traveling on a bus to London tried to light up an electronic cigarette, causing another passenger who spied vapor spiraling from the device to alert the police by cellphone; behind the event lay serious concerns about safety during the Olympics.
lead_paragraph: A passenger’s attempt to light up on a bus to London played into fears of a terrorist attack tied to the Olympic Games.

headline.seo: Olympics Terrorism Fears on Display in Britain
headline.main: In Scare Over Cigarette, Signs of a Britain on Edge
headline.print_headline: A Terrorism Scare That Wasn’t as the Olympics Near
